comment: This course was difficult, and although she seems very intimidating, she really does want her students to succeed and has some very fun moments. Show up to her class, take good notes, and definitely practice your speaking! You have to learn how to be comfortable answering questions verbally naturally over the course of this class.

You need to put more work in since it's a 2000 class. Final was a mess. 4 questions 3 had to be 45 seconds or more. All in one video. I understand she wanted us to improve our fluency, but was a little too harsh but I understand her intentions. Attendence and participation mandatory. 2 skits had to memorize script. overall decent and really nice
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Test heavy

comment: Since it is a higher level course, there is more work/studying that goes into it. The lesson consisted of vocab quiz 1, vocab quiz 2, workbook/reading & recording, and a test. So every class day something was "due". You need to buy a whole new textbook & pay for the online workbook. Mandatory attendance & no late work accepted.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Gives good feedback
